product.description: This AI-driven MMP (likely Mobile Measurement Partner) helps businesses turn customer data into powerful insights. It enables detailed tracking of top-performing distribution channels, monitoring actions down to individual clicks, downloads, and onboardings.

features.name: AI-driven insights
features.description: Leverages artificial intelligence to derive powerful insights from customer data.

features.name: Granular action tracking
features.description: Monitors user actions down to the click, download, and onboard levels.

product.targeted_market: Businesses that rely on understanding customer acquisition and performance across various distribution channels, likely in the mobile app or digital marketing space.
product.problem_product_is_solving: Lack of clear visibility into the effectiveness of distribution channels and the ability to attribute customer actions to specific sources. Difficulty in deriving actionable insights from customer data.
